story
Once upon a time, a man met a woman in Kasugani Village in Nara (last half is the poem he sent to her)
Japanese:Mukashi otoko nara no miyako Kasugano no sato yori ???naru onna o mite \"Kasugano no ????\"

title: Scene from Classical Literature
